Date: 24th November, 2023
DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF INDIA /206/1 1/2023 24 , 2023 Ref: IRDAVINT/CIR/IB/206/1 1/2023 24th November, 2023 / 1 ALL INSURERS AND INSURANCE BROKERS 
Sub: Discontinuation of filing of certain returns by Insurers and Insurance Brokers

Pursuant to notification of the IRDAI (Payment of Commission) Regulations, 2023, it is hereby clarified that insurers and insurance brokers are not required to furnish the following returns and certificates to the Authority: 1. Returns by Insurance Brokers: , 2018 Gs Returns as per the Clause (d) of sub regulations of Regulations 39 of the IRDAI (Insurance Brokers) Regulations, 2018 with a certificate (as per Annexure I-D of the said regulations) related to the confirmation that the insurance broker has received remuneration for direct insurance business within the prescribed limits outlined in Regulation 26 of the said regulations. 2. SM aalel & ERI Vaile / Certification by Insurance Brokers: , 20 Certificate (Schedule II Form W of the IRDAI (Insurance Brokers) Regulations, 2018) endorsed by Principal Officer and CFO (or equivalent), related to the confirmation that the remuneration and other payments received from the insurer are within the specified limits as per sub regulations of the regulation 34 of the said regulations. . 115/1, -500 032, 99989 0. 115/, District, Nanakramguda, Hyderabad-500 032, India : 91-40-20204000 aaarze : wwwairdai.gov.in : 91-40-20204000 Website: www.irdai.gov.in
3. : Certificate by Insurers engaging Insurance Brokers: , 20 Certificate (Schedule II Form W of the IRDAI (Insurance Brokers) Regulations, 2018) signed by the CEO and CFO of the insurer, separately for each broker, if the remuneration and other payments made to the broker exceed the stipulated limits as per sub regulation of Regulation 34 of the said regulations. This has approval of the Competent Authority. x IDaE ( GRY / Anita Josyula) FREI Heda (Awadh) / CGM (Intermediaries)
